title: Rigged
text: I have been playing this game daily. I have also spent money so that I can play opponents. What I have an issue with is the unfair advantage of players ranked 189 or 161 who I ranked 36 am paired to play with resulting in me losing and spending more of my personal income to replenish the tokens I loose from playing “pros”. I feel very ripped off and would really like if you consider people who want to enjoy your game fairly. If this issue doesn’t I will be removing this app and make sure to let my friends and family know that this game is rigged.

title: stupid and scripted game.
text: I played this game for many years, and a year ago I decided to delete it because I could no longer stand this nonsense. I decided to download it again, and remembered why I decided to delete it. The game does not have any realistic physics, it is terribly scripted and unrealistic. For example, my cue ball is blocked by the opponent’s balls and I decide to hit my ball from the wall, and then this circus begins, the ball flies in some incredible direction, by some miracle it touches the black ball, as a result, 2 enemy balls are pocketed and pocketed black ball. And believe me, this is only one of a million cases that happened during my gameplay of this game. And yes, I play this game very well, so there is no point in accusing me of being a bad player.

title: Predatory gambling microtransactions
text:
This app starts manipulating you the moment you open it. Once you manage to sign in using their broken sign-in process, before you can even start the game, it takes about 5 minutes to click through all of the various screens that come up, begging you to spend real-world money on the game. Again, this is before you can play the game for a single second. Once you do play, you’re hit with more screens begging you to buy things. I have to close at least 10 “offers” for every game I play. 

This game used to be fun, but now it’s predatory and cancerous. I recommend finding another one.

title: Harry’s review
text: Hello &ball pool. I enjoy your games so much that I’d love you to consider making it possible for players to players, mostly in Africa, Nigeria to be more exact, to earn real coins in currency value. Thus, making it possible to compete against other players with a real money price. Thank you for your kind response
